entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 26.
